snippet.title: Fumiko! Xbox One - Teaser
snippet.description:
Fumiko! is coming to Xbox One on February 23rd! I'm excited!
After months of hard work I have finished the Xbox One port of Fumiko! to bring the magic to a completely new audience: https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/store/p/fumiko/bv4mf73q1x61

Inspired by Serial Experiments Lain, this gravity-defying 3D Platformer takes you on a surreal trip through a twisted virtual network. Uncover the secrets this world tries to hide from you: an artificial intelligence named Fumiko!

Buy Fumiko! on Steam for only $6.99: http://store.steampowered.com/app/563810

Software used to make this game and this video:

OS: Linux (currently Arch Linux with Openbox as DE)
Engine: Unity3d
3D Editor: Blender
2D Editor: GIMP & Krita
Audio Editor: Audacity & FL Studio
Video Editor: Blender (NEW)
Recording: Simple Screen Recorder
Coding IDE: Vim + Vim Plugins + Terminator
Project Planning: Kanboard
Bug Tracking: Mantis

++++++++++++++++++
See you here:

https://twitter.com/FumikoGames
http://store.steampowered.com/app/563810
https://fumikogamestudio.itch.io/fumiko
http://www.indiedb.com/games/fumiko-the-game
https://www.fumiko-game.com
